# .LARGE[Poverty <br> & Inequality] <br> GLOA 610-001 <br> <br>


```{r include=F, cache=T}


library(WDI)


var = c('poverty' = 'SI.POV.DDAY',
        'GDPpc' = 'NY.GDP.PCAP.KD',
        'inequality' = 'SI.POV.GINI'
        )

wdi <- WDI(indicator=var,
           start=1960,
           country = 'all',
           end=2020,
           extra=TRUE)

wdi %>% 
  drop_na(GDPpc) %>%
  mutate(developed = 
           case_when(GDPpc > 10000 ~ "developed",
                     GDPpc < 10000 ~ "underdeveloped"
                     )) -> wdi2

```

```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results="asis", fig.width=16, fig.height=6, cache=T}


wdi2 %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=year,
             y=poverty,
             group=developed,
             color=developed,
             fill=developed)) +
  geom_point(size=0.5, alpha=0.25) +
  geom_smooth() +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.text = element_text(size=20),
        axis.text=element_text(size=20),
        axis.title=element_text(size=20)) +
  labs(x="Year", y="Poverty Rates")

```

.large[Data: SWIID, Solt 2020]

```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results="asis", fig.width=16, fig.height=6, cache=T}

load(file = "images/swiid9_1.rda")

swiid_summary %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=year,
             y=gini_disp)) +
  geom_smooth() +
  geom_point(size=0.5, alpha=0.2) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.text = element_text(size=20),
        axis.text=element_text(size=20),
        axis.title=element_text(size=20)) +
  labs(x="Year", y="Gini Coefficient")
         

```                     

---

<div class="full-width-tinted"><br>
  <h1> .large[Some Examples, Inequality in Four Countries ] </h1>
</div><br><br>


```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results="asis", fig.width=16, fig.height=6, cache=T}

name <- c("United States", 
          "Mexico", 
          "India",
          "Iran")

swiid_summary %>%
  filter(country==name) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=year,
             y=gini_disp, 
             group=country,
             color=country, 
             fill=country)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_ribbon(aes(ymin = gini_disp-1.96*gini_disp_se,
                  ymax = gini_disp+1.96*gini_disp_se), 
              alpha = .25, color=NA) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.text = element_text(size=20),
        axis.text=element_text(size=20),
        axis.title=element_text(size=20)) +
  labs(x="Year", y="Gini Coefficient")
         

```
